LanguageData.RWP_Shell_ExplosiveShell.label: 12-pound artillery shell
LanguageData.RWP_Shell_ExplosiveShell.description: A shell filled with high explosives. Can be fired from the Napoleon cannon or the Coehorn mortar. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RWP_Bullet_Shell_ExplosiveShell.label: 12-pound artillery shell
